channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.39 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.39

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fixed failure to expand the header
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/now: Migrate performance.timing
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: odata.v4.TableDelegate: Clear selection when updating the binding
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Prevent navigation when selecting a week

item.title: Version 1.108.40 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.40

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicPage: blank space on snap is no longer visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnResizer: Resizer should not be visible when table is busy
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: preserve value after rerendering of password field
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page where canceling a direct edit could result in the application remaining in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that returning to an application does not set the default table variant as modified
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterController: correctly restore dtoffset fields when low is used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: no more prevent multi token paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generating filters now respects settings on validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Tokenizer border is now displayed correctly for horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: IconPool: Add more mime-type mappings for MS Excel files
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Reduce minimal font size for FitToPage
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: set Verdana as default font family

item.title: Version 1.108.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.28

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover when using building blocks in the flexible programming model
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Status with icon and text overflows correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct uniqueness detection when TextArrangement is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed regex after translation change
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Press event of Go button is now correctly fired
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: sorting grouped columns when autoExpandMode = "Sequential"
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: RichTextEditor: Undo and Redo with keyboard do not work
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add styling for disabled calendar items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.108.29 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.29

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter

item.title: Version 1.108.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted the usage of 'navigationFinished', the new navigation event
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct getUiState for Edm.String properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.108.38 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.38

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct state for the Selected property on the UploadSetItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add tooltip to the up and down arrow buttons
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlProvider: V4 value list annotation is now prioritized over V2
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted

item.title: Version 1.120.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.24

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct state for the Selected property on the UploadSetItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: RTL flag is set on initialization
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the theme properties from charts while creating insights cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: Application developers can now modify the considerPresentationVariant property in designtime mode
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: checkSearchAllowed now does not sets errors for condition type fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: In case of deep create the model create entry only expects path and properties with oData
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: CommandExecution: Log error when command not found + make destroy fail-safe
    • Type: FIX, Description: Test Starter: Support ui5:// URLs for "page"
    • Type: FIX, Description: Test Starter: Support resource-roots configuration

item.title: Version 1.120.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.26

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: errors prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fixed failure to expand the header
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the default time formatter is updated when the localization is changed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: User input not overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Appointments text is resized depending of the scale factor now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: inverted status is correctly displayed in ObjectListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: Added optional chaining
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: preserve value after rerendering of password field
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Selected item fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Removed maximum width of the MenuButton
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use an extension API to support the navigation mode in the navigateExternal method
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that returning to an application does not set the default table variant as modified
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the list report table failed to refresh after executing a determining action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now assigned the correct heading levels to the titles of the key value facets in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the correct heading levels were not applied to the controls when the section or subsection titles were hidden on the object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Tokenizer border is now displayed correctly for horizon theme
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: inner control binding context is now same as the SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: maxLength handling with TextOnly and isDigitalSequence
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/now: Migrate performance.timing
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the fields in the function import dialog weren't correctly validated
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: set Verdana as default font family
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Prevent navigation when selecting a week
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.AnchorBar: Update ARIA role for anchor bar buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Calc FIX

item.title: Version 1.120.27 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.27

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicPage: blank space on snap is no longer visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Bar: Add role "toolbar" depending of the content
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the theme color parameters for stacked bar micro chart to fulfil the minimum contrast requirements
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: no more prevent multi token paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generating filters now respects settings on validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable - Prevent unchecked access
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/*: use string value for sap-cancel-on-close
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Reduce minimal font size for FitToPage
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: Search field not cleared on reopen

item.title: Version 1.120.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.28

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix failing QUnit test
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Speech output for table suggestions is now enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Appointments text is resized depending of the scale factor now
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when dynamic date range filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable text wrapping for long values in the dropdown of the Editing Status filter field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized the draft popover placement in the table column to improve text visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the correct heading levels were not applied to the smart form titles when the object page control hide the subsection title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the unwanted back navigation button from the message dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Binding context for fixed-value scenarios is now synchronized
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: no caching of metadata with cache buster segment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel#createEntry: ignore transient context if path is absolute
    • Type: FIX, Description: IconPool: Add more mime-type mappings for MS Excel files
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: render as <dl> in display mode
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC.ValueHelp: Popover promise handling improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Typeahed - announce table headers on arrow navigation
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: render as <dl> in display mode

item.title: Version 1.120.20 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.20

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that occurred with fields containing navigation properties in a containment scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: Copying an entity using the DataFieldForAction annotation now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support uploading various file types as attachments on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the mandatory fields function correctly for navigation properties in the filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that occurred with fields containing navigation properties in a containment scenario
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the URL parameter sap-ui-fe-variant-id works as expected
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added a delay in scrolling if horizontal lazy loading is enabled for any chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now suppress the call of the invalidate function on setShapeSelectionMode
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed unfurling issue for systems with different domain patterns
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle the changes related to the hostname in the gateway response
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our method to detect data loss to support nested app routes for My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the count on the dynamic tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the logic that allows access to the multiselection plug-in for the UI tables
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Currency is now correctly read out when not editable
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model when single value is passed from In parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Non Mandatory ComboBox validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for ComboBox
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for ComboBox performed on search
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Size of filter field in column menu

item.title: Version 1.120.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.22

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Cancel action works in the operations dialog for strict handling messages in changeset mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now explicitly request the message path for static actions
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also filter the value list description using hidden keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the accessibility issue in aria-required-children within uploadCollection by changing the role 'option' to 'listitem'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust tooltip announcement
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with characters that aren't a part of ASCII characters
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: On items load the ComboBox now applies the already set value on specific case
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Console error removed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.120.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.23

  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided a fix for the auto proportionate zoom issue that occurred on initial rendering of the Gantt Chart
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of the selected TAccountItems not getting highlighted
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.120.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.25

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat is taken into account when formatting the output in 24-hour mode support
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that canceling a direct edit no longer results in being stuck in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now invalidating the context of the currently active subobject page during draft activation on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when table filters are applied
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Value is no longer cleared when binding context is changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnnotationHelper: UI.Hidden annotation default value
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the formatting of smart fields in the function import dialog

item.title: Version 1.124.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.9

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the pageReady event that occurred when a custom section included MDC tables or MDC charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused incorrect enablement of the action buttons
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the checkbox selection for multi-input fields wasn't working correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the pagination feature again for all value help dropdowns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page that occurred when the end user removed a section by adding a null check at the section layout access point
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an error code to handle failures in the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise scenarios
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the correct label on the message button in the footer of the object page
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: variant now stores info for condition type filters having default operation
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that for the new tokens created in SmartMultiInput, the correct context is returned
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Order of filter items is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.Spredsheet - Stop condition fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Legend selected is translated correctly in German

item.title: Version 1.124.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.11

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed the issue in share functionalities
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the table variant state not being set correctly after the application was upgraded to a new version
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow the considerPresentationVariant property to be modified in designtime mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed theme properties from chart while creating insights cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate application names displayed in the list of related apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the dirty page variant occurring during the external navigation for MultiView applications operating in the flexible column layout mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the Share functionality in list reports by removing incorrect code related to the collaboration consumer class

item.title: Version 1.127.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.6

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application

item.title: Version 1.127.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.5

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the checkbox selection for multi-input fields wasn't working correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with characters that aren't a part of ASCII characters
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: variant now stores info for condition type filters having default operation
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.Spredsheet - Stop condition fixed

item.title: Version 1.127.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.7

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the dirty page variant occurring during the external navigation for MultiView applications operating in the flexible column layout mode

item.title: Version 1.130.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the creation of a new entity using the NewAction annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused a crash after saving when the WebSocket annotation was used for side-effect configuration
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the first field that is visible on the action parameter dialog and correctly focus on it
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where charts configured with a relative metaPath and contextPath didn't load
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon only link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust grid cell description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed the issue in share functionalities
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartVariantManagementModel: updateView take care of standard variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that for the new tokens created in SmartMultiInput, the correct context is returned
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Order of filter items is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: 0 value for NUMC with TextArrangement is now not shown initially
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Do not apply currency customizing for decimals on currency formats, if format option "style: 'long'/'short'" is set
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.Spredsheet - Stop condition fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics

item.title: Version 1.130.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the messages from the back end containing braces are properly displayed on the UI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request validation and message side effects in the same batch to improve performance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Value is no longer cleared when binding context is changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: changing localization now recreates the buttons with reloaded resource buntle
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: add in ignoredFields description, only if the key column is in ValueList entity set and is visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model properly on suggested item selection
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description is now correctly handled in display mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: variant now stores info for condition type filters having default operation
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: FESR: semanticStepName not set for interaction
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect scrolling prevented

item.title: Version 1.130.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application works correctly when the personalization settings of a chart are set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: The mass edit functionality now works for fields containing a composite binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the RichTextEditor building block with metadata can be used with a button group aggregation
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Uploadset illustrated message properties are correctly updated when they are bound with a model
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct circle radius on the HarveyBallMicroChart
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: function import value-list is now loaded properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField is now re-rendered with proper mode on SmartTable scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: inner control binding context is now same as the SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: set Verdana as default font family

item.title: Version 1.130.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.5

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Copying an entity using the DataFieldForAction annotation now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue where the draft indicator wasn't displayed for the draft of an active record
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the app was failing to load while creating a default variant that involved removing and adding a field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support uploading various file types as attachments on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the implicit semantic object mappings containing sensitive data are not passed to the target application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help condition propagation when there are no conditions
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page where canceling a direct edit could result in the application remaining in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now invalidate the context of the currently active subobject page during draft activation on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when table filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved several issues related to the AI-Assisted Easy Filter
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: no more prevent multi token paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generating filters now respects settings on validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable - Prevent unchecked access
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Reduce minimal font size for FitToPage
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied

item.title: Version 1.130.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.9

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the field validation behaved inconsistently within the flexible column layout applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: The appState of the list report is now correctly updated if there are multiple updateAppState calls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the message box was closed before displaying the message popover
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the enableAutoColumnWidth and widthIncludingColumnHeader properties in the manifest.json file when adding a column to a table
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: No duplicate headers appear when users access the S/4 system via a shared card in MS Teams
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now removing the disabled buttons upon updating the toolbar contents
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the JAWS announcement for the nodes of process flow control
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized the draft popover placement in the table column to improve text visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable text wrapping for long values in the dropdown of the Editing Status filter field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when dynamic date range filters are applied

item.title: Version 1.130.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.3

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with internationalization of field labels in the parameter dialog
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed currentLocationText alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectHeader: IntroPress event now fired properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue in the timeline where it was re-rendering in its original state after removing certain filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: Cannot fetch X-CSRF token - sap.insights.CardHelper
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the navigation wasn't working correctly with the table variants or chart variants on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects on the object page function correctly when link fields of the DataFieldForAnnotation type are involved
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with triggering a side effect event when modifying values in the value help fields within the table on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now made some improvements to the AI-Assisted Smart Summarization and AI-Assisted Easy Filter features
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: maxLength handling with TextOnly and isDigitalSequence
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Unable to remove tokens in adapt filters dialog scenario is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now not fetched when the control is hidden
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Fix failing QUnit
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Add detection for CSS preloads
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element|Popup: get DOMRef after calling parent "destroy"
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/LabelEnablement: handle destroy of label when updating inner control
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove additional role

item.title: Version 1.130.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.6

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: The RichTextEditor is now correctly displayed in edit mode when an object is created
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use a modifer to retrieve the existing PropertyInfo when the Remove condition is called
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the display property of action parameters is correctly calculated using the ValueList reference annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adding items in a multi-input field with side effects now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the default values of action parameters are defined before setting them as binding data
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the value help within the filter fields that caused the VariantManagement building block to not load properly
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the value help within the filter fields that caused the VariantManagement building block to not load properly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use messageBundle to set the text for the Upload button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: preserve value after rerendering of password field
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that offline status is taken care in the contact popup
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that returning to an application does not set the default table variant as modified
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct height to hide the StackedBarMicroChart label
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Fix wrong number of decimals in scientific notation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel#createEntry: ignore transient context if path is absolute
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the field validation work properly in the Function Import Dialog
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Adjustment class added for table

item.title: Version 1.130.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.7

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also consider the text arrangement annotation when a second filter field with a value help is opened from within a value help dialog

item.title: Version 1.130.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.8

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables in the value help dialog are now rendered as responsive tables on mobile devices

item.title: Version 1.131.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.131.1

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the navigation option in the message popover even if a description or descriptionUrl is not present in the message model, in case where AI-Assisted Error Resolution is enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a token for the unit field is also added in the easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed theme properties from chart while creating insights cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow considerPresentationVariant property to be modified in designtime mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate application names displayed in the list of related apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with of a dirty page variant occurring during the external navigation for MultiView applications operating in the fixed column layout mode

item.title: Version 1.131.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.131.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Action on card level
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: visual alignments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: no invalidation on landmarkInfo change
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Adjust Badge creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: pin button is fixed
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the context menu to expand or collapse a node in a tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a scrollThreshold setting for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the pageReady event that occurred when a custom section included MDC tables or MDC charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the transition context-bound messages no longer appear once the object page is closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the singletonPathVisitor annotation can be used to configure the visibility of the custom action buttons in the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: The creation dialog now consistently appears over the ObjectPage when the create button is pressed in the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the creation of a new entity using the NewAction annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the context menu to expand or collapse a node in a tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a scrollThreshold setting for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the first field that is visible on the action parameter dialog and correctly focus on it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application works correctly when the personalization settings of a chart are set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the singletonPathVisitor annotation can be used to configure the visibility of the custom action buttons in the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where charts configured with a relative metaPath and contextPath didn't load
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the implicit semantic object mappings containing sensitive data are not passed to the target application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve now resolved the issue with filters not being removed using chart personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the recently entered values popover incorrectly appears empty when no filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the custom aggregate property as aggregatable in charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that sorting works correctly in tree tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer truncate links inside contact fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back-end errors in the upload table are always displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that in apps using inline creation mode, the empty row is added to the bottom of the table when the end user modifies a column
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue with the pending $metadata request when using the CollectionRoot property within the ValueList annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the Chart building block didn't load in extension fragments
    • Type: FIX, Description: The tree table now supports pasting a node as a root node
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page that occurred when the end user removed a section by adding a null check at the section layout access point
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show an error message for a chart when the same property is marked as both groupable and aggregatable with a custom aggregation method
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an error code to handle failures in the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise scenarios
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that in apps using inline creation mode, the empty row is added to the bottom of the table when the end user modifies a column

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: QUnit test fixed

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Now marker is always displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Popover is correctly placed in the ComboBox

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: prevent right click from firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Do not show empty Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: The sub-header is now taken into account when calculating the top padding
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected

item.title: Version 1.132.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.132.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Usage of relative links in WebPage cards is now enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.cards.BaseHeader: Press event is now fired when Spacebar key is released
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.AdaptiveCards: Visual test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.AdaptiveCards: Visual test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fixed failure to expand the header
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: state color in numeric header side indicator fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: card with paginator sets proper manifest url to child card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: fix focus styles of Card in GridContainer
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: fixed numeric header gap between icon and numeric indicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Internal demo no longer throws exception
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: resolved boolean values are now correct
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show the Open in New Tab option in the context menu if the object page is set to open in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now sort the values in columns by their unit of measure or currency first, followed by the values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've implemented the DataFieldForActionGroup annotation, which allows the grouping of actions and their rendering within menu buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support using an absolute path as the target entity for side effects events in a list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display 10 fixed rows in a tree or analytical table on an object page by default when the table is not the sole control in the section or when the sectionLayout is set to Page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify a title for the action confirmation dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tree tables and analytical tables are now correctly loaded in the flexible programming model explorer
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider all navigation paths including the parent level navigation while creating a binding path
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the email validation string that caused the application to become unresponsive
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly manage focus on the table when grouping data
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use the correct icons for criticality, as defined in the SAP Fiori for Web Design Guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now update the BreadCrumbs link after data changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set 'Multi' as the default selection mode for a tree table if the selection mode is not specified in the manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the messages from the back end containing braces are properly displayed on the UI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the contextPath property is consistently bound to the meta model, allowing the correct context path to be generated regardless of any entity name conflicts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved a performance issue that occurred while creating an object in collaborative draft mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request validation and message side effects in the same batch to improve performance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application state is not preserved when entering and exiting the key user adaptation mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with handling the startup parameters for applications using the sap-keep-alive mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show the Open in New Tab option in the context menu if the object page is set to open in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now sort the values in columns by their unit of measure or currency first, followed by the values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now set the rowCountMode parameter in the tree table to Auto when entering fullscreen mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display 10 fixed rows in a tree or analytical table on an object page by default when the table is not the sole control in the section or when the sectionLayout is set to Page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now set the rowCountMode parameter in the grid table to Auto when entering fullscreen mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow an action-specific title in the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show semantically connected fields if all their contents are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a VariantManagement building block, and you can now use the Apply Automatically function with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help condition propagation when there are no conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now add stable identification values to each of the segmented button items in the content switcher elements on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: The mass edit functionality now works for fields containing a composite binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an error that prevented the change handlers from executing for fields that are bound to a JSON model
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've removed the paginator reference from subobject pages, as it is no longer needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use the correct icons for criticality, as defined in the SAP Fiori for Web Design Guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the isValid parameter of the change event is correctly set based on the MDC promise in the FieldAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set 'Multi' as the default selection mode for a tree table if the selection mode is not specified in the manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with navigation from the error message for empty but required fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer allow using the drag-and-drop functionality to move a node to a position directly adjacent to its current position
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the IDs of actions for intent-based navigation in tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the filter context URL is included in the selection variant for quick view links, allowing potentially sensitive data to be excluded
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support using an absolute path as the target entity for side effects events in a list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify a title for the action confirmation dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow an action-specific title in the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now update the BreadCrumbs link after data changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved a performance issue that occurred while creating an object in collaborative draft mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: : We've resolved an issue where the Apply Automatically feature for a variant wasn't working correctly after switching to another variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that navigation path binding is not duplicated for the header facets, such as contact, form, and address, on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Button: Adding a new style for the badge
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: add preventable beforeClose event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Introducing 'src' property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: update visual design for Horizon themes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: Enhance keyboard navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the preview load while back navigating to the file in preview dialog's carousel
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: prevent adding tokens to disabled input
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Accessible name is now provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Screen reader announcements now adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Documentation is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Fix misaligned SearchField
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed currentLocationText alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Prevent losing focus on nMore popover close
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: provide accessibility info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: apply tooltip properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Visual test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: render tokens based on their order
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: move focus into Popup before opening animation starts
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: prevent unnecessary firing of appointmentSelect event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/m/Input: Respect the busy indicator as part of the input
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now disable the video preview once the Preview dialog is closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Bar: adjust aria-labelledby attribute rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of image not rendering in the numeric content control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat is taken into account when formatting the output in 24-hour mode support
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Switch: remove duplicated state announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadsetwithTable plugin will now handles offline upload request error handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: adjust inner list announcements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Connection between sap.m.MenuItem and sap.ui.unified.MenuItem is handled correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Improve accessibility sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Improved arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: first week of year is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/m/demokit/tutorial/walkthrough: Replace test links with testsuite
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/m/demokit/tutorial/walkthrough: Correct links for the testsuite
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: remove redundant announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Text truncation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TableSelectDialog: fixed documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Removing the note in the documentation for endContent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Last X included options are translatable now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: add accessible name for the popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Console error prevented
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now set the rememberSelections property to false by default for responsive tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the focusOnEditExtension API in object pages to set the focus on a specific control in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support side effects for custom fields in object pages
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've removed SideEffectUtil from the AnnotationHelper method to prevent cyclic dependency issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved several issues related to the AI-Assisted Easy Filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where colons were not being displayed after the label in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the 'Open in new tab' option for links annotated with DataFieldWithIntentBasedNavigation in applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with invoking the Summarize action in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page where canceling a direct edit could result in the application remaining in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved the performance of the initial loading of an object page with a table configured using inline creation mode and the DefaultValuesFunction definition
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users are now redirected to the root page of the analytical list page or list report applications when they discard draft creation from a new tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when table filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now invalidate the context of the currently active subobject page during draft activation on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the contents are correctly displayed in the Adapt Filters dialog for analytical list page applications across all themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use an extension API to support the navigation mode in the navigateExternal method
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now assigned the correct heading levels to the subsections, and these levels are automatically adjusted based on the visibility of the respective section or subsection

item.title: Version 1.132.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.132.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Popover visibility is now fixed

item.title: Version 1.133.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Added option for overflowing with a "Show More" button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Prevent error when FCL is not rendered
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: errors prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.CardHeader: Status text is not overflowing
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card dialog can now open a Component Card
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix overlapping of busy indicator
  • Library: sap.fe.base
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that fields with a currency or units of measure in a table are correctly aligned along the decimal separator
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the applyState and retrieveState APIs to store and retrieve states of custom sections and subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where skipping the decimal validation using the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation was omitted due to the automatic rounding of the field values
  • Library: sap.fe.controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that fields with a currency or units of measure in a table are correctly aligned along the decimal separator
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that fields with a currency or units of measure in a table are correctly aligned along the decimal separator
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the applyState and retrieveState APIs to store and retrieve states of custom sections and subsections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option to aggregate data based on the visible table columns in analytical list page applications
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the context menu of tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set the rowCountMode property to 'Interactive' for grid tables in the manifest.json file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where skipping the decimal validation using the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation was omitted due to the automatic rounding of the field values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved the documentation for the invokeAction method
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that occurred with fields containing navigation properties in a containment scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: Navigation properties that are applicable to line items and annotated with TextArrangement as TextOnly are now available for filtering in tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: Copying an entity using the DataFieldForAction annotation now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Visibility settings of menus are now applied correctly when menu items have their own visibility settings defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the action parameter dialog stays open when the user cancels a 412 warning message
    • Type: FIX, Description: Sorting by currency or unit of measure properties that reference texts now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when discarding the changes made to a non-draft object
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define groups of action parameters in the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Key users can now enable the interactive row count mode of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that fields with a currency or units of measure in a table are correctly aligned along the decimal separator
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Key users can now modify the default value of the scrollThreshold parameter to optimize data loading in tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the applyState and retrieveState APIs to store and retrieve states of custom sections and subsections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We have added a change event in the FormElements building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option to aggregate data based on the visible table columns in analytical list page applications
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now show a message strip in a custom action dialog

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the context menu of tables

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the display property of action parameters is correctly calculated using the ValueList reference annotations

    • Type: FIX, Description: Key users can now save changes made in the configuration dialog of key user adaptation after closing and reopening the dialog

    • Type: FIX, Description: Adding items in a multi-input field with side effects now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue where the draft indicator wasn't displayed for the draft of an active record
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the app was failing to load while creating a default variant that involved removing and adding a field
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now apply sorting to micro charts in tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that occurred with fields containing navigation properties in a containment scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: Enabled settings of menus are now applied correctly when menu items have their own enabled settings defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that type-ahead is not shown in case of non-empty field values
    • Type: FIX, Description: Navigation properties that are applicable to line items and annotated with TextArrangement as TextOnly are now available for filtering in tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: Visibility settings of menus are now applied correctly when menu items have their own visibility settings defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the default values of action parameters are defined before setting them as binding data
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the action parameter dialog stays open when the user cancels a 412 warning message
    • Type: FIX, Description: Sorting by currency or unit of measure properties that reference texts now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the personalization settings in the Chart building block weren't being considered

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now changed the working of the space and enter buttons as per the standard

    • Type: FIX, Description: Support of offline status when the user is signed out from teams

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that the insight cards reflect the same semantic coloring as the source table when defining row-level criticality
